thread.title: Kim Kardashian skips Super Bowl to book shop for North | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian skips Super Bowl to book shop for North | Daily Mail Online

author: Kirkristen For Dailymail.Com
title: Kim Kardashian skips Super Bowl to book shop for North | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share And from the looks of Kim's social media video she was the only shopper in the store. As she showed off her surroundings she exclaimed, 'Cool bookstore!' 'Well everyone is at the Super Bowl, I'm out getting Valentine's Day books at a book store for Northie, the 36-year-old mother-of-two gushed 'Cool bookstore!' Kim said in her video. The busy mama skipped out on the Patriots-Falcon epic overtime ending to prepare for Valentine's Day Lone shopper: From the looks of Kim's social media video she was the only patron in the store A few of the books Kim had picked out included a Hello Kitty Happy Valentine's Day book. She captioned the collection of snaps: 'Book club!' This comes soon after Kim retweeted a post that suggested Kanye West perform at next year's Super Bowl halftime show. 'Never too early. #KanyeForSuperbowl52,' a fan site dedicated to the Love Lockdown hit-maker posted which his reality star wife shared. Her selections: A few of the books Kim had picked out included a Hello Kitty Happy Valentine's Day book 'Book club': She captioned the collection of snaps The original post by TeamKanyeDaily received comments ranging from 'I need kanyebowl,' to 'Let's get the campaign going now,' and 'Yes plz We need to make this happen!!!!' However, some were not so pleased with the idea as replies included 'No thanks,' 'that would be the worst half time show ever,' and 'Don't bother, he wouldn't show up.' Meanwhile Kim - who has denied new claims her marriage to Kanye is over - recently faced speculation that her union is on the rocks once again. But the couple - who tied the knot in 2014 - showed no signs of troubles when they headed into a party to watch the big game in Los Angeles earlier on Sunday. 'Never too early': Kim retweeted a post suggesting husband Kanye West perform the halftime show at next year's Super Bowl 'Kanye for Super Bowl 52': Another user also posted in support of Kanye which Kim retweeted during the Super Bowl game
